name: web-tool
description: Boilerplate tool for front-end web development

scripts.build: npm run html && npm run js && npm run sass && npm run assets
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run html & npm run js:minify & npm run sass:minify
scripts.sass: node-sass --source-map=true --source-map-contents=true src/styles/main.scss dist/css/style.css && postcss --use autoprefixer dist/css/style.css -d dist/css/
scripts.sass:minify: node-sass --output-style compressed src/styles/main.scss dist/css/style.css && postcss --use autoprefixer dist/css/style.css -d dist/css/
scripts.serve: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:sass' 'npm run watch:serve'
scripts.serve:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run watch:serve

author: Masanori Uehara
